content: Hi! I am a 19 year old student currently studying physics at Grinnell College. I am a lover of physics, photography, data, maps, urban planning, and design. My interests and passions are all over the place, but I am consistently fascinated by the ways in which we can represent the world around us, whether mathematically or artistically. My goal with this website is to have a platform to exhibit the projects I work on and determine where and how they overlap.

title: Hollis akins
